wikitext.*:
'''''telepi''''',<ref name=L347>{{L|347}}, p. 426 (question 4)</ref> '''''telpe'''''<ref name=UT6e/> (or '''''telpë'''''<ref>{{PM|Shibboleth}}, p. 356 (note 4)</ref>), and '''''telep-''''',<ref name=UT6e>{{UT|6e}}</ref> are [[Telerin]] words for "[[silver]]".

==Etymology==

In a letter, [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] stated that the form ''telepi'' derives from [[Primitive Elvish]] ''[[kyelepē]]''.<ref name=L347/>

[[Christopher Tolkien]] has noted that ''telpe'', ''telep-'' derive from [[Sundocarme|root]] [[KYELEP]].<ref name=UT6e/>

==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[telpe|tyelpe/telpe]]''
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[celeb]]''
==Compounds==
*[[Telperion]]
*[[Teleporno]]
*[[Telperimpar]]
